title: Create Japanese README (README.ja.md)
description:
Create a Japanese language README file for the Hello-World repository.

File: README.ja.md

Content should include:
- Japanese greeting: "こんにちは世界！" (Konnichiwa Sekai!)
- Brief description in Japanese explaining this is a multilingual version
- Link to the main README

Acceptance: README.ja.md exists and contains valid UTF-8 Japanese text
